name: Shen Events
slogan: Our team produce unique events for corporations seeking to use the live event format for promotions
description: Whatever your business sector, if your organisation is looking to run any type of event please give us a call. We can help you understand what a valuable business investment conferences and other events can bring to your organisation.

jobs.title: Corporate Events Sales
jobs.description:
We are recruiting a corporate event sales role. The individual will develop and execute sales plans to achieve individual goals working with venues and corporate clients on special events.

Shen360 events is an events company with a difference. With over 50 years event production and management experience in-house, you can feel totally confident with any of our projects, whether you are partnering with us or simply wishing to attend an event.  Operating, as we do, across a broad range of event-types, we can leverage our skills and experience for business, social or any special personal occasion.

You are a good fit if you have:

•  consultative approach

•  good telephone manner

•  a background in sales, advertising or working with high net worth individuals

•  a confidant individual who presents professionally

•  excellent written and verbal communication skills in English

• experience in professional client relationship management

In this position, you will;

•  develop client strategies as well as align the company strategy with client business priorities

•  discuss budget allocation with customers

•  identify key stakeholders, then build and maintain relationships

•  drive the solution sales process

•  collaborate closely with Event Producers and Marketing and provide guidance

•  support relationships with relevant vendors

• consultative approach

• good telephone manner

• a background in sales, advertising or working with high net worth individuals

• a confidant individual who presents professionally

• excellent written and verbal communication skills in English

• experience in professional client relationship management

In this position, you will;

• develop client strategies as well as align the company strategy with client business priorities

• discuss budget allocation with customers

• identify key stakeholders, then build and maintain relationships

• drive the solution sales process

• collaborate closely with Event Producers and Marketing and provide guidance

• support relationships with relevant vendors

jobs.title: Senior Event Producer
jobs.description:
Shen360 events is an events company with a difference. With over 50 years event production and management experience in-house, you can feel totally confident with any of our projects, whether you are partnering with us or simply wishing to attend an event.  Operating, as we do, across a broad range of event-types, we can leverage our skills and experience for business, social or any special personal occasion.

As an Events Producer you will work within a small but busy team focused on increasing the impact of the Amnesty Movement and contribute to human rights change through maximising relationships with artists, creative partners and events Your specific role will concentrate on:

•	Nurturing and Developing relationships with a portfolio of artists & influencers
•	Leading on and/or support events & partnerships (largely focused around comedy & entertainment) which create visibility, attraction and a sense of community and belonging to new and existing supporters
•	Identifying and managing talent and event opportunities which support our priority campaigns and organisational goals.
The role will include but is not limited to:
•	Leading on, delivering or supporting the production of high-profile events designed to amplify Amnesty messages to key Amnesty audiences and strengthen relationships with influential people
•	Managing relationships with a portfolio of artists & influencers
•	Identifying and managing opportunities and activities for these artists
•	Researching, identifying potential new relationships
•	Supporting tactical artist cultivation project(s) and agreed campaign work
•	Develop and implement communications plans to inspire, inform and motivate artist relationships. This includes responsibility for creating and distributing the artist newsletter.
•	Managing and motivating, recruiting as necessary, a team of volunteers who are essential for delivery of our plans,

About You
You will have demonstrable experience of working directly with and representing organisation(s) with celebrities/high profile artists, their managers, agents and publicists to deliver media and social media coverage, campaigning, lobbying, growth and awareness objectives. You will have significant experience of working on high-profile projects and events. You will have a strong interest in arts and entertainment and a background in production of live events or broadcast projects is essential. You will have excellent interpersonal skills with outstanding communication & negotiation skills, both written and verbal as well as excellent understanding of communications procedures when working with artists and agencies.

You will have an excellent ability to prioritise own work and manage conflicting deadlines, project / production management skills and have an ability to think creatively and inspire innovation. You can be flexible and able to move between tasks while maintaining accuracy and attention to detail and react quickly, meet deadlines, organise a busy workload and prioritise tasks. You will have experience of managing and developing support staff or volunteers. You will have significant experience of producing engaging and creative powerpoint presentations to a very high standard and of working with data and admin systems. You are a confident and enthusiastic team player and at the same time able to work unsupervised and use own initiative.

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
The Marketing Specialist is responsible for the design and delivery of digital PPC advertising across Google, Bing, Facebook and Instagram of our brands, services and products. You will also analyse and report on our PPC advertising ROI including embedding tracking codes to enable conversion statistics, and measure the effectiveness of our digital advertising (what works, what doesn't and why?)

Shen360 events is an events company with a difference. With over 50 years event production and management experience in-house, you can feel totally confident with any of our projects, whether you are partnering with us or simply wishing to attend an event.  Operating, as we do, across a broad range of event-types, we can leverage our skills and experience for business, social or any special personal occasion.

Responsibilities

Working within PPC advertising budgets, advising on optimal spend to achieve campaign success
Tailoring digital advertising so that it is effective across all of our wide-ranging target demographics
Work across multiple business units, including financial, legal, marketing, recruitment, media, property and others
Pay Per Click campaigns, work with Facebook Ads and Google Ads, social media planning
Strategy as well as SEO for new website development

Qualifications

3+ years' of industry experience
Digital marketing qualification or professional accreditation
Interest in current and emerging digital trends preferred
Excellent interpersonal skills


So if you are looking for a new and exciting opportunity coupled with the chance to really excel and develop a diverse digital presence… we'd love to hear from you! This could be the start of something special.

jobs.title: Immigration Solicitor Principal
jobs.description:
You will take the lead on providing day-to-day advice on immigration matters, while working closely with the immigration legal team.  The successful candidate: has sound business judgment and exercises common sense, is a hands-on worker, is intellectually curious and resourceful, takes appropriate initiative, knows when to escalate issues, and has excellent interpersonal skills to build relationships across offices and departments. You must be able to communicate clearly, both in writing and orally, to team members, department heads, senior management, and external parties to assess and resolve legal matters effectively and efficiently and serve as a trusted resource for the company.

What you'll do:

· Advise on the structure of new business opportunities within the applicable regulatory frameworks.

· Manage outside counsel on various matters.

· Stay apprised of and advise the management team and global legal team on changes in UK laws, rules, and regulations affecting the firm.

· Special projects as directed by management.

Skills you'll need:

· Qualified Solicitor legal qualifications

· At least 7 plus years PQE legal experience in private practice in the UK or another European jurisdiction.

· Eagerness to contribute as an active and vital member

· Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment with a limited hierarchical structure

About the Group

Shen360 visionary Jessie Shen is no stranger to international business. Through her role as CEO of Global Shen Trade Ltd, Jessie has accumulated a wealth of knowledge and expertise in international markets and event management throughout the world. By conducting independent market research and engaging with key players in Trade, Real Estate and Consulting, Jessie discovered that companies were crying out for something more fulfilling than the traditional approach to event management – and on this premise, Shen360 was born.

Shen360 events is an events company with a difference. With over 50 years event production and management experience in-house, you can feel totally confident with any of our projects, whether you are partnering with us or simply wishing to attend an event.  Operating, as we do, across a broad range of event-types, we can leverage our skills and experience for business, social or any special personal occasion.

To improve compliance with identity document validation, successful applicants will provide their right to work in UK.
